verbs.description: Trump [V: will] likely find a way to claim that the “ maximum pressure ” technique worked — even if the results from any Kim - Trump meeting fall far short of current rhetoric about denuclearization .

[ARG0: Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [ARGM-ADV: likely] [V: find] [ARG1: a way to claim that the “ maximum pressure ” technique worked — even if the results from any Kim - Trump meeting fall far short of current rhetoric about denuclearization] .

[ARG0: Trump] will likely find [ARGM-MNR: a way] to [V: claim] [ARG1: that the “ maximum pressure ” technique worked — even if the results from any Kim - Trump meeting fall far short of current rhetoric about denuclearization] .

Trump will likely find a way to claim that [ARG0: the “ maximum pressure ” technique] [V: worked] — [ARGM-ADV: even if the results from any Kim - Trump meeting fall far short of current rhetoric about denuclearization] .

Trump will likely find a way to claim that the “ maximum pressure ” technique worked — even if [ARG1: the results from any Kim - Trump meeting] [V: fall] [ARG2: far short of current rhetoric about denuclearization] .
